key_points: Meghan Markle and Prince Harry prepared for a gala with their wedding glam squad.
The couple's friend, makeup artist Daniel Martin, shared their joyful dynamics in PEOPLE Royals.
Meghan appeared on The Ellen DeGeneres Show and visited NYC with Harry, showcasing their active public life.
The transition from senior working royals to financially independent life in California is highlighted.
The couple enjoys their life as a family of four with their children, Archie and Lili.
They strive for work-life balance, with Meghan advocating for paid parental leave in the U.S.
Prince Harry focuses on battling misinformation and disinformation.
Harry criticized the term 'Megxit' for its misogyny and how it was propagated.
The couple is facing their second year of independence, relying on each other.
Their friend notes they are inseparable and happy.
